thread.section_title: Figo Pet Insurance Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Figo Pet Insurance | figopetinsurance.com
thread.title: Lauren Patterson
thread.title_full: Figo Pet Insurance reviewed by Lauren Patterson

author: Lauren Patterson
title: Lauren Patterson
text: I am SO excited to have joined the Figo Family. They were SO helpful, and answered any and all questions. They do not push any sort of program on you. Their site offers very clear information, but any questions you have, the Figo team is quick to respond. I spent well over 10 hours analyzing various pet insurances, and Figo offers the best coverage, at the best rate! Plus their customer service is top notch - and to me that makes a difference!
